name: The Misadventures of Botsworth
description:
Armless and discarded, Botsworth is in quite the pickle! Having been deemed defective and thrown in a trash chute, this funky little robot has to make its way back up from the depths of the robot factory if it ever wants to see what the outside looks like. Its simple goal is to one day find friends and/or arms. Whichever comes first, really.

From dreamy meadows to high flying action with ventilation fans to hazardous factory machinery, there's a lot standing between Botsworth and the factory exit.

Featuring:
  • A simple and humorous story
  • 15 platforming levels across 5 unique stages
  • Simple controls, yet challenging obstacles
  • Piles of cogs just waiting around to help you set a high score
  • All future updates and expansions COMPLETELY FREE
  • And one funky robot that will steal your heart
